statements: SELECT * FROM project_workflows WHERE id = 1;
SELECT project_name, workflow_status FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_status = 'pending';
SELECT project_name, approval_status FROM project_workflows WHERE approval_status = 'approved' AND workflow_status = 'completed';
SELECT trigger_name, project_name FROM project_workflows WHERE approval_status = 'pending' ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_status = 'in-progress';
SELECT * FROM project_workflows WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT project_name, workflow_status FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_status = 'active' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT project_name, approval_status FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_status = 'pending' AND trigger_name = 'manual' ORDER BY project_name ASC, approval_status ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT project_name FROM project_workflows WHERE workflow_status = 'inactive';
SELECT workflow_status, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM project_workflows GROUP BY workflow_status HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM approvals WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT approver_name FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_id DESC;
SELECT project_id, approver_name, approval_status FROM approvals WHERE project_id = 2 AND approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects ORDER BY project_name DESC;
SELECT approvals.approval_id, approvals.approver_name, projects.project_name FROM approvals INNER JOIN projects ON approvals.project_id = projects.project_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, COUNT(approval_id) AS total_approvals FROM projects LEFT JOIN approvals ON projects.project_id = approvals.project_id GROUP BY project_id, project_name;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM projects ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM projects WHERE project_status = 'Approved';
SELECT workflow_name, workflow_description, project_id FROM workflows WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT workflow_name, approval_status, created_at FROM workflows JOIN approvals ON workflows.workflow_id = approvals.workflow_id;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM projects WHERE project_status='Completed';
SELECT workflow_name, approval_status FROM workflows JOIN approvals ON workflows.workflow_id = approvals.workflow_id;
SELECT project_name, COUNT(workflow_id) AS total_workflows FROM projects LEFT JOIN workflows ON projects.project_id = workflows.project_id GROUP BY project_name;
SELECT approval_id, workflow_name, approved_by, created_at FROM approvals JOIN workflows ON approvals.workflow_id = workflows.workflow_id ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT approval_id, approved_by, approval_date FROM approvals WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT workflow_name, tasks_assigned, approval_required FROM workflows ORDER BY tasks_assigned DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE project_id = 2 ORDER BY task_id DESC;
SELECT approval_id, approved_by, approval_date FROM approvals WHERE task_id = 3 AND approval_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT workflow_name, tasks_assigned FROM workflows WHERE approval_required = TRUE ORDER BY workflow_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM projects;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'Alice';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM tasks WHERE task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT approval_id, approval_status, approver FROM task_approvals ORDER BY approval_date ASC;
SELECT project_name, project_manager FROM projects;
SELECT task_name, task_description, start_date, end_date, task_status FROM tasks;
SELECT project_name, project_description, start_date, end_date, project_manager FROM projects WHERE project_manager = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM task_approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM triggers WHERE trigger_condition LIKE '%error%' AND trigger_action = 'restart';
